response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might pay for it. Considering its true worth and your potential satisfaction, we propose a price of $120 for this exceptional item. We believe this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and an affordable price for you, maximizing the value for both parties. We look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 120}
